textBeforeTable: A forum of NGOs took place just before the opening of the Intergovernmental Comittee. Agenda and documents 17 accreditation requests presented by NGOs 36 nominations to the Representative List 10 financial assistance requests greater than US$25.000 2 proposals for the Register of Best Safeguarding pratices 8 nominations to the Urgent Safeguarding List 16 periodic reports on the implementation of the Convention Inscriptions Read more on the elements inscribed Files presented by States Parties Bureau: composition and meetings Albania, Azerbaijan, Belgium, Brazil, Burkina Faso, China, Czech Republic, Egypt, Greece, Grenada, Indonesia, Japan, Kyrgyzstan, Latvia, Madagascar, Morocco, Namibia, Nicaragua, Nigeria, Peru, Spain, Tunisia, Uganda and Uruguay Committee Members Decisions: English|French Summary
